title: Patch Notes
content: ng Throw and scales with the raven's level. Fungal Infestation can now be used as a Reaction when killing a target. The Spectator's Charm condition should now be broken through damage or by killing the Spectator. The druidic spells that Halsin gains for free can now be upcasted. Fixed Cloudkill not affecting characters at the edge of its range. Fixed Infernal Spears joining combat when dropped.
